response.explain: Since there is no previous action code or execution error, we can start planning from scratch. The task goal is to freeze the chicken and steak. From the observed objects and relations, we can see that the chicken and steak are inside the bottom cabinet. The fridge is closed and within reach.
response.subtask:
(1) Open the bottom cabinet.
(2) Take out the chicken from the bottom cabinet.
(3) Put the chicken in the fridge.
(4) Take out the steak from the bottom cabinet.
(5) Put the steak in the fridge.
(6) Close the fridge.
